documentation.text:
@title Contract for sealed bid second bid auction
 @dev All function calls are currently implemented without side effects
@notice Address of the person selling
@dev The minimum reserve price given by the seller
@dev Variable for triggering the end of the bidding, can be replaced with time based system
@dev Address of highest bidder so far
@dev Value of highest bid so far
@dev Value of second highest bid so far
@dev Mapping used to check if the bid of a certain address has been processed
@dev Mapping balances of all bidders
@dev Mapping amount bid of all bidders
@dev Mapping hashed bids of the bidders
@notice Event for receiving hashed bids
@notice Event for receiving revealed bids
@notice Event for withdrawal of funds at auction end
@notice Constructor to initialise minPrice of auction, and number of bids in the auction

@notice Function that recieves hashed bid
 @param hashed the hash sent to the contract
@notice Function that returns the balance of the sender

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "Auction reveal phase is not completed"

arguments.value: Auction reveal phase is not completed

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "Auction reveal phase is not completed"

documentation.text: @notice End auction function that accounts can use to withdraw funds used in the bidding if they failed to win the auction

documentation.text: @notice End auction function that accounts can use to withdraw funds used in the bidding if they failed to win the auction

devdoc.details: All function calls are currently implemented without side effects

params.secret: the secret with which the value was hashed to give the hashed value
params.value: the value of the bid as claimed by the sender

params.hashed: the hash sent to the contract

amountBid.details: Mapping amount bid of all bidders

bidCheck.details: Mapping used to check if the bid of a certain address has been processed

endOfBidding.details: Variable for triggering the end of the bidding, can be replaced with time based system

hashedBids.details: Mapping hashed bids of the bidders

highBid.details: Value of highest bid so far

highBidder.details: Address of highest bidder so far

reservePrice.details: The minimum reserve price given by the seller

secondBid.details: Value of second highest bid so far

devdoc.title: Contract for sealed bid second bid auction

EndAuction(address,address,uint256).notice: Event for withdrawal of funds at auction end

Bid(uint256,uint256).notice: Function that receives the bid after the end of the auction

balanceof().notice: Function that returns the balance of the sender

constructor.notice: Constructor to initialise minPrice of auction, and number of bids in the auction

endAuction().notice: End auction function that accounts can use to withdraw funds used in the bidding if they failed to win the auction
